## Welcome

Welcome to my academic website. I'm passionate about understanding **what makes teams resilient** when they face pressure and adversity. 

Through my research and teaching, I explore the complex dynamics that help some teams thrive while others struggle - and how organizations can build more resilient, effective teams.

## What You'll Find Here

🔬 **[Research & Publications](publications.qmd)** - My latest conference presentations and academic work on team resilience and organizational psychology
